quotes.text: Half the battle in life is just focusing on playing your own game and blocking out what everyone else is doing / saying / thinking.
Nothing endures but change
Chance favors the prepared mind
Discipline equals freedom
If you can't get out of it, get into it
Forgiveness can't change the past. But, it will determine your future
Gratitude equals Attitude
When the plan falls apart the adventure begins
A moral position is not a message
Take the attitude that what you are thinkng and feeling is valuable stuff.  Then be enough to get it all down on paper.
Writing is about hypnotizing yourself into believing in yourself, getting some work done, then hypnotizing yourself and going over the material coldly
You don't always have to chop with the sword of truth.  You can point with it too
The truth of your experience can only come through in your own voice
There is no cosmic importance to your getting something published, but there is in learning to be a giver
Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because they want to do it
Day by day you have to give the work before you all the best stuff you have not saving up for later projects.  If you give freely there will always be more.
The way to do really big things seems to be to start with deceptively small things
Start with a small bet and iteratively scale your ambitions as you go
Make it about the work and the principles behind it...not about a glorious vision that makes a good headline
Don't let the need for progress be the enemy of enjoying the process
When you hear something you will forget it.  When you see something you will remember it.  But not until you do something will you truly understand it.
